# sharedSystemTypesetter(for:)

**Type Method**

Returns a shared instance of a reentrant typesetter that implements typesetting with the specified behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
class func sharedSystemTypesetter(for behavior: NSLayoutManager.TypesetterBehavior) -> Any
```

## Parameters

- **behavior**: The desired behavior.

## Return Value

A shared instance of a reentrant typesetter that implements typesetting with the specified behavior.

## Discussion

Possible return values are described in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSLayoutManager/TypesetterBehavior-swift.enum] section for [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSLayoutManager].

## Related Documentation

- **typesetterBehavior**: Returns the current typesetter behavior.

## Getting a typesetter

- **sharedSystemTypesetter**: Returns a shared instance of a reentrant typesetter.
